title: The most impressive item you have!
author: SportsItemShow

posts.post_title: The most impressive item you have!
posts.post_content:
Do you have an amazing piece of sports history—a rare autographed baseball, signed stadium seats, or even a championship ring that you’re looking to sell? Are you a collector of tons of sports memorabilia or just a dedicated fan with a gem? 
 
The producers of History Channel’s Pawn Stars and American Restoration are bringing you the best sports memorabilia show out there!

If you have a unique, rare, or awesome piece of sports memorabilia  that you’d like to sell or just show off, please e-mail [url]SportsItemShow@gmail.com[/url] with a picture of the item, a brief description of what it is and why it is special, and tell us how you got it!

I would have figured you (new poster) would have just placed this in the main topics section.  This is neat.  I wonder how many T206 Wagners that people got from their "grandfathers" will be submitted :D

Actually, this is a pretty cool thing... hopefully we'll see a few more neat pieces of memorabilia being shown on the antiques road show...
